words.prompt: Something that is _____________ is able to be replaced or restored.
Something that is _____________ is hard or impossible to believe.
When something is _____________ , it is changed in its character or condition.
When you _____________ something, you use it up or destroy it.
_____________ are the results of an action or condition.
A _____________ is an unplanned or unexpected situation in which something happens at the same time or in the same way.
When something is _____________ , it works quickly and completely.
When something is _____________ , it is put in place and ready for use or service.
_____________ means to have withdrawn or moved back.
When something is _____________ , it can make someone angry or impatient.
_____________ means to lose or have to give up because of some fault, accident, or mistake.
_____________ is the power to put up with hardships or difficulties.
_____________ are people from whom one is descended.
_____________ means looked down on as worthless, or scorned.
To _____________ means to show or feel great respect for a person or thing.
_____________ means having or showing strong feeling, purpose, or effort.
_____________ poems have irregular lines and lack a metrical pattern and rhyme scheme.
_____________ is the use of sensory words to create a picture in the reader’s mind.
A _____________ , such as “the lake is a mirror,” compares two unlike things without using like or as.
A person’s _____________ include his or her ancestors.
_____________ is a cloud of tiny drops of water or other liquid in the air.
_____________ is a quality that makes one person or thing different from others.
To _____________ means to eat quickly, in large chunks.
_____________ is giving human characteristics to anything that is not human.
